functions.tag: {pages:['["",{"text":"Hellish Lantern\\n             "},{"text":"v","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n          ","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"gold"},{"text":"  @","color":"green"},{"text":"  <","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n       x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"[","color":"red"},{"text":"     ]","color":"red"},{"text":"  x\\n          x ","color":"reset"},{"text":" &","color":"gray"},{"text":"  x\\n             x\\n\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"@","color":"green"},{"text":" - Carved Pumpkin\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"v","color":"gold"},{"text":",","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"gold"},{"text":",","color":"reset"},{"text":"<","color":"gold"},{"text":" - Waxed Cut Copper\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"[","color":"red"},{"text":",","color":"reset"},{"text":"]","color":"red"},{"text":" - Charged Blaze Rod\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"&","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Campfire","color":"reset"}]'],title:"Formula: Hellish Lantern",author:"???",generation:1}

{pages:['["",{"text":"Everglacier\\n             "},{"text":"#","color":"aqua"},{"text":"\\n          ","color":"reset"},{"text":"* ","color":"blue"},{"text":" o","color":"green"},{"text":"  *","color":"blue"},{"text":"\\n      ","color":"reset"},{"text":" #","color":"aqua"},{"text":"  o","color":"green"},{"text":"     o","color":"green"},{"text":"  #","color":"aqua"},{"text":"\\n          ","color":"reset"},{"text":"*","color":"blue"},{"text":"  o","color":"green"},{"text":"  *","color":"blue"},{"text":"\\n             ","color":"reset"},{"text":"#","color":"aqua"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"#","color":"aqua"},{"text":" - Blue Ice\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"*","color":"blue"},{"text":" - Calm Crystal\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"green"},{"text":" - Bottle o\' Enchanting","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"While the florid stories of wizards seeing through crystal balls are largely untrue, I have found that this particular one does help me concentrate while enchanting. Perhaps you can make use of it as well.\\n\\n- E\\n "}'],title:"Formula: Everglacier",author:"E..?",generation:1}

{pages:['["",{"text":"Staff of Fire (+3)\\n             "},{"text":"^","color":"#BDAC2D"},{"text":"\\n          x  I  x\\n       x ","color":"reset"},{"text":" >","color":"gray"},{"text":"     <","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"  x\\n          x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"dark_red"},{"text":"  x\\n             ","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"#BDAC2D"},{"text":" - Nether Star\\nI - Netherite Ingot\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Forgotten Runestone\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"<","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Draft of the Prism\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"dark_red"},{"text":" - Staff of Fire (+2)\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"gold"},{"text":" - Hellish Lantern [Power III]","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"After my brothers and I drove the Legion underground with our mastery of "},{"text":"Fire","color":"red"},{"text":", those fools swore to destroy every last copy of this book. Are you a coward, as they were? Or will you join us as one who commands the mightiest element?\\n\\n ","color":"reset"}]'],title:"Trial By Fire",author:"Pyronicus, Duke of Devestation",generation:1}

{pages:['["",{"text":"Staff of Air (+3)\\n             "},{"text":"^","color":"#F7D790"},{"text":"\\n          x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"gray"},{"text":"  x\\n       x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"     <","color":"gray"},{"text":"  x\\n          x ","color":"reset"},{"text":" ^","color":"gold"},{"text":"  x\\n            ","color":"reset"},{"text":" o","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"#F7D790"},{"text":" - Ambient Crystal\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Brightsteel Ingot\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Draft of the Prism\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"<","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Forgotten Runestone\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"gold"},{"text":" - Staff of Air (+2)\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Bottle o\' Dreams","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"I used to be someone who wrote down everything. But things change.\\n\\nI\'ll be moving on soon, to smaller and better things. But I can\'t help but wonder...\\n "}','["",{"text":"Does anyone really understand "},{"text":"Air","color":"#EBD245"},{"text":" as Travelers do?\\n\\nI can tell you that the ancients did not.\\n\\nThough they breathed it, they did not understand it. Live it.\\n\\n\\n ","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"...\\nIf they had - Strict legionnaires, stuffy archivists, sea cultists, any of them -\\n\\nHow might things have turned out differently?\\n\\nI suppose we\'ll never know.\\n- E\\n "}'],title:"Things Change",author:"E..?"}

{pages:['["",{"text":"Staff of Earth (+3)\\n             "},{"text":"^","color":"dark_green"},{"text":"\\n          x ","color":"reset"},{"text":" I","color":"#C46C1E"},{"text":"  x\\n       x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"gray"},{"text":"     <","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"  x\\n          x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"green"},{"text":"  x\\n             ","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"dark_green"},{"text":" - Tangleheart\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"#C46C1E"},{"text":" - Copper Ingot\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Forgotten Runestone\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"<","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Draft of the Prism\\n--->","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"^ - Staff of Earth (+2)\\n"},{"text":"o","color":"gold"},{"text":" - Enchanted Golden Apple","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Breathe.\\nRemember the trees, the mountains.\\nBreathe.\\nThere is much left to do.\\nBreathe.\\nWithin your deepest self, "},{"text":"Earth","color":"dark_green"},{"text":" remains.\\nBreathe.\\nRemember who you are, who you used to be, and breathe out.\\n\\n- Thren","color":"reset"}]'],title:Breathe,author:Thren,generation:1}

{pages:['["",{"text":"Staff of Water (+3)\\n             "},{"text":"^","color":"dark_blue"},{"text":"\\n          x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"aqua"},{"text":"  x\\n       x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"     <","color":"gray"},{"text":"  x\\n          x ","color":"reset"},{"text":" ^","color":"blue"},{"text":"  x\\n             ","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"dark_blue"},{"text":" - Heart of the Sea\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"aqua"},{"text":" - Diamond\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Draft of the Prism\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"<","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Forgotten Runestone\\n--->","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"^","color":"blue"},{"text":" - Staff of Water (+2)\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":" - Everglacier [Concentration III]","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"My dearest Grace,\\n\\nWould that I had time enough to write all I wish, but I know not when I will next make port; This, my love, must be enough for now.\\n\\nThree weeks ago,\\n "}','{"text":"we docked The Crane in this uncanny land. The mists grow thick here, and the trees stranger than I have seen.\\n\\nWhile we are beset by dangers at every turn, I cannot help myself; The spirit of adventure calls me onward."}','["",{"text":"I wonder if you would think the same.\\nIn this furthest north, the sea is riddled with glaciers, and the land with deep snowfall.\\n\\nBut at sea, Grace, at sea!\\n\\nThe "},{"text":"Water","color":"blue"},{"text":" feels alive!\\n ","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"Like the very ocean calls out to my innermost being. \'Press on\'!\\nE has asked me to write that they miss you terribly.\\n\\nThe poor dear does not handle the cold well.\\n "}','{"text":"My dear, I cannot tell if the lands beyond will be merciful.\\n\\nBut I could not let this voyage be in vain.\\n\\nKeep with you this formula. Anston thinks it is the most important we have found so far."}','{"text":"I will be with you again, be it land, sea, or god that stands between us.\\n\\nKeep safe, my love.\\n\\nI will be home before you know it.\\n\\n- Mel <3"}'],title:"Lost Coast",author:Mel,generation:1}
